allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve critical bugs - Supabase storage, image compression, and empty src warnings

- Fix Supabase storage error by using placeholders for large base64 image data
- Increase image compression timeout from 5s to 10s and improve quality settings
- Fix empty src attribute warnings by providing fallback placeholder images
- Add better error handling throughout the app
- Improve code structure and add missing useCallback/useMemo optimizations

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
